name: virtual-trial-room-arjs-webpack
description: Virtual Trial Room using AR.JS and Three.js managed via Webpack.
author: Safal Sharma

scripts.start: yarn && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --config config/webpack.dev.js
scripts.open-gh: gh repo view -w || echo 'Oops, looks like you don't have GH CLI, install it from: https://github.com/cli/cli ðŸ˜Ž
scripts.create-gh-pages: git branch gh-pages -f && git push origin gh-pages -f && gh-pages -d dist && gh repo view -w
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn create-gh-pages && yarn open-gh && echo 'Deployed successfully ðŸš€'
